example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2CustomerGateway -CustomerGatewayId cgw-1a2b3c4d
BgpAsn : 65534 CustomerGatewayId : cgw-1a2b3c4d IpAddress : 203.0.113.12 State : available Tags : {} Type : ipsec.1
example.description: This example describes the specified customer gateway.

example.code:
PS C:\>$filter = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.Filter PS C:\> $filter.Name = "state" PS C:\> $filter.Values = @( "pending", "available" )
PS C:\> Get-EC2CustomerGateway -Filter $filter
example.description: This example describes any customer gateway whose state is either pending or available.
This example describes all your customer gateways.
